name: Blinded by Fear
description:
Blinded by Fear is a sci-fi horror game with a unique visual mechanic. Due to unforeseen circumstances you have been surgically blinded. Without your conventional sight the only way for you to navigate your surroundings is via an implanted, cybernetic LiDAR device.

Spray LiDAR dots to uncover the world as you move through it. Experience the environment as individual snapshots in time. Witness visuals like you have never seen before: one dot at a time.



Story

In a future where employing prisoners is cheaper than deploying machines, the Nephilim Corporation needs you for their new contract.

The ANIMA, a research and mining facility situated on Ganymede, Jupiters largest moon, has gone dark. The Nephilim board wants an investigation, and as a prisoner, you are contractually and legally obligated to fulfil their request. 

In return you have a chance to reduce your prison sentence. The catch? In order to obtain an accurate scan of the ANIMA, the Nephilim Corporation demands that you to undergo a surgical procedure to remove your sight, and install a state of the art vision system, LiDAR OS.

With every scan you have a chance to reduce your prison sentence. With every scan you have a chance to uncover the horrors of the ANIMA.

Will you be able to fulfil your contract? Can you uncover the dark secrets of the ANIMA and the even darker secrets of the Nephilim Corporation?

Only time will tell.
